results.content: I started but cannot continue because I cannot understand what the instructor is saying. The description of the course was exactly what I wanted but have sadly asked for a refund because I don't want to spend all my energy trying to understand what the lecturer is saying instead of the coding concepts.

results.content: The instructor was hard to understand and almost ready to get a refund. But I like the materials about the Security and OAuth2 and could use these as references in the future.
results.content_html: The instructor was hard to understand and almost ready to get a refund. But I like the materials about the Security and OAuth2 and could use these as references in the future.

results.content: Difficult accent.  Worse, it is very hard to see and follow what he is doing, and why.  He addresses the exact topic I’m interested in - dotnet core authentication and authorization - but his presentation is so confusing that even after some careful review he did little to help me understand the topic.
